content: Daivamaaya kartthaave! Pakal samayatthe addhvaananga llil ninnu nyangallude shareeram viramikkukayum, laukikachintakallilninnu nyangallude manassu pinvaangukayum cheythukondu ee sandhyaasamayatthu shaantamaayi thirusannidhiyil nilako nd. Nithyasthuthikallum thudarchayaaya sthothrangallum ninakkarppi kkuvaanum nyangallude jeevane samrakshichu nayikkunnavanum nyangallude aathmaakkallude sahaayiyum rakshithaavumaaya ninte krpaykku sthuthi paaduvaanum nyangalle yogyaraakkaname. Nyangall ninakku sthuthiyum sothravum karettunnu. Hosho...

Akhilaandatthe vahippone
Hanta vahichu kurishumaram
Praanapradanaam praanamayan
Thaniye ruchichu maranatthe
Athirin pidikallilamaraatthon
Srshdi-kkokkeyumallavatton
Kabarilamarnnu parethapure
Maruvee lokamahaaveeran.

Nin praarththhana nyangallkkabhayam
Kanye! Dhanye! Thalamurakall than samvaranatthaal
Eeshanu maathaavaayolle!
Mariyaame! Nin thanayanu nyangallo dalivundaakaan
Anavaratham praarththhikkaname.

Knoomaa moonnodu naamam moonnaay-samsthhithicheyyum
Sathyaikesha thrithvamathaam
Thaathannaayu sthuthi thanayanunathiyum roohdishaaykku
Sthothravumundaayidatte.

Chonnaall mariyaam mannanmaarude mannanthanne
Pettathinaal nyaan bhaagyavathi
Thannaamgyatthaal seemakallullppade bhoomiye muzhuvan
Vaazhunnoneppaalichen.

Vaazhverum kanyakamariyaaminnormma dinatthil
Saamodam drshdikallellaam
Sveekrthayaakkitthalsmrthiye bahumaanichonaam
Udayonekkeertthikkunnu.

Bhaagyam nibiyarkkum shleeharkkum sahadenmaarkkum
Punaruththhaanamahaadivase
Kellkkum thaathane makanekkaanum paavana roohaa
Makudam mauliyilaniyikkum.

Sahaderothi peedakarodupedikkillethum
Nyangallaho theevaallukallil
Ee meyu naasham poondennaalum jeevanodaathmam
Paadum sthuthiyum sthothramathum.

Naathhaa! Ninnekkanakatthekkaall rathnatthekkaall
Snehichon dhanyan thanne
Undaayeedum bahumaanamavanniha lokatthil
Melil shaashvatha jeevithavum.

Naathhan chonnaan paapiniyodaayu povuka naaree
Nin paapam mochanamaarnnoo
Evangelisthhanmaaroppam suvisheshatthil
Nin vrtthaantavumezhuthum nyaan.

Aashvaasam nalkenam naathhaa nin daasanmaar
Kkazhivillaatthoru raajyatthil
Melurishilem puriyil jeevagranthhatthil nee
Avarude perukallezhuthaname.

Srshdichenmel nin kaivachu
Aadiyilaadatthe-Daivam vellllidine
Mannaalullavaakki-kalppichekukayaay
Jeevaashvaasamathum-sthothram paadeeduvaan
Haa......Uhaa........ Vaakkin vaibhavavum.

Svargatthinnetthi shaapatthil ninnum
Kurishaal rakshichon sleebaavandanaye
Parisheelippichon balavaan samskrthyan
Haa.....Uhaa......Avane vandikkaam.

Neethipriya puthri daivaprasavithri
Krpa neeyaarjichittudayoneyenti
Nee saubhaagyavathi ninnormmaykkengum
Haa....Uhaa....... Paranunnathiyeki.

Mariyaamelishbaa lakshya paanyetthiya
Vismaya naukangall vaagmiye yelishbaa
Mariyam rakshakane ppettaaraalambam
Haa.....Uhaa......Thalpraarththhanayennum.

Bhaagyam nibiyarkkum-bhaagyam shleeharkkum
Bhaagyam sahaderkkum-udayavanude vazhiyil
Malinatha theendaathe yaanam cheyvorkkum
Haa......Uhaa...... Mozhi kaakkunnorkkum.

Sahadere! Nyangall-kkaakrpayaachippin
Praarththhippin nyangall-samrakshitharaavaan
Saatthaan veezhatte-ningade maaddhyasthham
Haa......Uhaa........ Nyangallkkaalambam.

Rodhichaan yoshvaa vaanavithaanatthil
Chandraarkkanmaare maartthommaa shleehaa
Thalpriyarennivar than praarththhanayaal naathhaa
Haa......Uhaa.....Rodhikkuka shiksha.

Kani bhakshichaadam manasaa mrthiyaarnnu
Pakaram srshdipathi velllliyathaam naallil
Sleebaatharuvinmel kaikall viricheki
Haa....Uhaa..... Avanaayavakaasham.

Enthapanam naalleykkennoro dinavum
Nyaan theerppundaakkum kaalam pokunnu
Pizha nilanilkkunnu krpacheyyuka naathhaa
Haale........Uhaa......Sharanam nin krpathaan.

Ulakithiludaneellam krpa varshikkaname
Naathhaa arachanmaar pallllikallaachaaryar
Kkekeedaname nin shamavum shaantiyathum
Haa......Uhaa.....Mochanamengallkkum.

Nin thirumeyu bhakshichuyirelum raktham
Paanam cheytha mrthar pithyavaramaarnnore
Raajyavumazhivattoruyirum nedeeduvin
Haa....Uhaa.....Evam kellkkaname.

Ninneprathi vadhamettunithyam nyangall haa......Uhaa....
Nyangalleyenniyarukkaan nirtthiyoraattin kuttikall pol
Ninte mukham pinmaattaruthe haa.....Uhaa.....
Vismrthamaakaruthe nyangallude deenathayum yaathanayum.

Vimalanmaar sahade
Dushdavidheeshanmaareennum-kashdappaadukallettore!
Prathidaanam samrakshithamaa-nakshayabhaasuragehatthil
Nyangallkkennum- ningade praarththhana sangketham.

Ekathanoojan than sahadere!
Unnatha thaatha-prathhamasutha priyare!
than snehatthaalettu ningall
Vadhamavanaayi-yaathana kaikkondu-
Naathhan moolam-baliyaayarppitharaam ningall-
Kkormmaye-yettiyavan dhanyan.

Ekkaalatthum nin preethiyezhum
Neethiparanmaarullllathinaal sthuthithe
Nohabraahaamisahaakku yaakkobu
Moshayodelyaa-ennivar mumpundaayu
Aa rakthatthaal-innangayodarththhikkatte
Dhanyanmaaraam-sahadenmaar.

Maathrvishuddha smrthisambandham nalkuka naathhaa!
Thalpraarththhanayaal punyamivarkkum mrtharaayorkkum.

Daivasuthan than maathaavaayi dhanyathayaarnnoll
kanyakamariyaam thannormmadinam kaamyam yogyam
Vishvaasatthodapperunnaall kondaadunnore
Thalpraarththhanayaal shikshakall neekkikkaakkum naathhan.

Nammude naathhan paathaallatthil paarkkuka moolam
Vaangippoyor nediya bhaagyam kaamyam yogyam
Kallarayinnum mrthare varuvin mrthihathamaayi
Naashatthinnum viduvichone vaazhtthippaadin.

Bhaagyavathikkum siddharkkum mrtharaam bhaktharkkum
Smrthiyuyaratthilumee sabhayilumundaayeedatte.

Nyangallude kartthaavaaya yeshumishihaa! / Ninte karunayude vaathil nyangallude nere nee adaykkaruthe / kartthaave! Nyangall paapikallaakunnu /  ennu nyangall ettu parayunnu / nyangallodu karunayundaakaname.
Kartthaave! Ninte maranatthaal / nyangallude maranam maayikkappeduvaanaayittu / ninte sneham ninte sthhaanatthuninnu nyangallude adukkalekku ninne irakkikkondu vannu / nyangallodu karunayundaakaname.
